name: Suspicious Puff Pops
desc: A snack with lots of different flavors. To eat several in a row is to experience a myriad of strange flavors that... burn your stomach? Did you just have bad luck with flavors, or are they all like this?

customize.name: Recipe: Puff Pops
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Puff Pops.

customize.name: Puff Pops
customize.desc: A snack with lots of different flavors. If you close your eyes, you won't be able to guess what flavor you'll get next, and eating them is sure to increase your heart rate — and that's what makes this popular amongst the Scions of the Canopy. By the way, the "pop" part of the name comes from the sound of Grainfruit kernels bursting open under high temperatures.

customize.name: Delicious Puff Pops
customize.desc: A snack with lots of different flavors. These surprising flavors of these "little bombs" explode between your teeth. Your left and right hands work in unison, sending more hurtling headlong into your mouth. Om nom nom — amid the sound of chewing, all your stress melts away.

customize.name: Suspicious Puff Pops
customize.desc: A snack with lots of different flavors. To eat several in a row is to experience a myriad of strange flavors that... burn your stomach? Did you just have bad luck with flavors, or are they all like this?

customize.name: Grainfruit
customize.desc: This plant is named after the giant grains that grow along the cob.

customize.name: Sugar
customize.desc: A seasoning derived from Sweet Flowers. Has the power to give both energy and happiness.

customize.name: Salt
customize.desc: A savory seasoning. A precise but adequate amount will elevate the quality of the cuisine.

customize.name: Pepper
customize.desc: Peppery. Cuts through oily flavors and excites the taste buds. Goes best on meat.

value.text:
A little surprise from the Scions of the Canopy.
Regenerates 1 HP to the selected character every 8s for 32s and displays the logo of the Scions of the Canopy. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
